segments.text: Miss Gray , would you please type this report for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you print it out before 12 o'clock ? I need it this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . I will do it immediately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please double space it and print it out on the laser printer so I can read it easily .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Would you like this report done in a formal or informal style ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please type it in a formal style .
segments.speaker: S1
